ocaml/debugger/unix_tools.ml - ocaml

  1. (**************************************************************************)

  15. (**************************************************************************)

  17. (****************** Tools for Unix *************************************)

  19. module Real_stdlib = Stdlib
  20. open Misc
  21. open Unix

  23. (*** Convert a socket name into a socket address. ***)
  24. let convert_address address =
  25.   try
  26.     let n = String.index address ':' in
  27.       let host = String.sub address 0 n
  28.       and port = String.sub address (n + 1) (String.length address - n - 1)
  29.       in
  30.         (PF_INET,
  31.          ADDR_INET
  32.            ((try inet_addr_of_string host with Failure _ ->
  33.                try (gethostbyname host).h_addr_list.(0) with Not_found ->
  34.                  prerr_endline ("Unknown host: " ^ host);
  35.                  failwith "Can't convert address"),
  36.             (try int_of_string port with Failure _ ->
  37.                prerr_endline "The port number should be an integer";
  38.                failwith "Can't convert address")))
  39.   with Not_found ->
  40.     match Sys.os_type with
  41.       "Win32" -> failwith "Unix sockets not supported"
  42.     | _ -> (PF_UNIX, ADDR_UNIX address)

  44. (*** Report a unix error. ***)
  45. let report_error = function
  46.   | Unix_error (err, fun_name, arg) ->
  47.      prerr_string "Unix error: '";
  48.      prerr_string fun_name;
  49.      prerr_string "' failed";
  50.      if String.length arg > 0 then
  51.        (prerr_string " on '";
  52.         prerr_string arg;
  53.         prerr_string "'");
  54.      prerr_string ": ";
  55.      prerr_endline (error_message err)
  56.   | _ -> fatal_error "report_error: not a Unix error"

  58. (* Find program `name' in `PATH'. *)
  59. (* Return the full path if found. *)
  60. (* Raise `Not_found' otherwise. *)
  61. let search_in_path name =
  62.   Printf.fprintf Real_stdlib.stderr "search_in_path [%s]\n%!" name;
  63.   let check name =
  64.     try access name [X_OK]; name with Unix_error _ -> raise Not_found
  65.   in
  66.     if not (Filename.is_implicit name) then
  67.       check name
  68.     else
  69.       let path = Sys.getenv "PATH" in
  70.         let length = String.length path in
  71.           let rec traverse pointer =
  72.             if (pointer >= length) || (path.[pointer] = ':') then
  73.               pointer
  74.             else
  75.               traverse (pointer + 1)
  76.           in
  77.             let rec find pos =
  78.               let pos2 = traverse pos in
  79.                 let directory = (String.sub path pos (pos2 - pos)) in
  80.                   let fullname =
  81.                     if directory = "" then name else directory ^ "/" ^ name
  82.                   in
  83.                     try check fullname with
  84.                     | Not_found ->
  85.                         if pos2 < length then find (pos2 + 1)
  86.                         else raise Not_found
  87.           in
  88.             find 0

  90. (* Expand a path. *)
  91. (* ### path -> path' *)
  92. let rec expand_path ch =
  93.   let rec subst_variable ch =
  94.     try
  95.       let pos = String.index ch '$' in
  96.         if (pos + 1 < String.length ch) && (ch.[pos + 1] = '$') then
  97.           (String.sub ch 0 (pos + 1))
  98.             ^ (subst_variable
  99.                  (String.sub ch (pos + 2) (String.length ch - pos - 2)))
  100.         else
  101.           (String.sub ch 0 pos)
  102.             ^ (subst2 (String.sub ch (pos + 1) (String.length ch - pos - 1)))
  103.     with Not_found ->
  104.       ch
  105.   and subst2 ch =
  106.     let suiv =
  107.       let i = ref 0 in
  108.         while !i < String.length ch &&
  109.               (let c = ch.[!i] in (c >= 'a' && c <= 'z')
  110.                                || (c >= 'A' && c <= 'Z')
  111.                                || (c >= '0' && c <= '9')
  112.                                || c = '_')
  113.         do incr i done;
  114.         !i
  115.     in (Sys.getenv (String.sub ch 0 suiv))
  116.        ^ (subst_variable (String.sub ch suiv (String.length ch - suiv)))
  117.   in
  118.     let ch = subst_variable ch in
  119.       let concat_root nom ch2 =
  120.         try Filename.concat (getpwnam nom).pw_dir ch2
  121.         with Not_found ->
  122.           "~" ^ nom
  123.       in
  124.         if ch.[0] = '~' then
  125.           try
  126.             match String.index ch '/' with
  127.               1 ->
  128.                 (let tail = String.sub ch 2 (String.length ch - 2)
  129.                  in
  130.                    try Filename.concat (Sys.getenv "HOME") tail
  131.                    with Not_found ->
  132.                      concat_root (Sys.getenv "LOGNAME") tail)
  133.             |  n -> concat_root
  134.                       (String.sub ch 1 (n - 1))
  135.                       (String.sub ch (n + 1) (String.length ch - n - 1))
  136.           with
  137.             Not_found ->
  138.               expand_path (ch ^ "/")
  139.         else ch

  141. let make_absolute name =
  142.   if Filename.is_relative name
  143.   then Filename.concat (getcwd ()) name
  144.   else name
